predicate.note: Frames file for 'inspect' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Santa Fe stopped freight trains Tuesday night while its officials inspected track but resumed service at 10:45 p.m. when they found no damage [*T*-1] .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: LSI LOGIC CORP. , Milpitas , maker of customized integrated circuits , annual sales of $ 550 million [*U*] , NYSE , has halted manufacturing at its three plants in the area while they are inspected [*-1] for structural damage .
